resources.string:
Lightning Launcher is a fast, light and extremely customizable launcher (also known as "home screen replacement", or "shell"). 
 
Lightning is the launcher of choice for people who wants a butter smooth, light on memory and tailor-made home screen replacement. 
 
Unlike most traditional launchers, Lightning lets you place items everywhere on the desktop, not only to the left or right sides, but also on pages above and below. Think at the desktop as an unlimited canvas extending in both horizontal and vertical directions instead of a strip, and you will get the idea. 
 
This mean: as many pages as you need, more space for your apps, and faster navigation. 
 
Lightning has some interesting features, such as being able to put widgets in folders (and even other folders for hierarchical navigation), or letting you freely move, scale and rotate any items (note: please switch to "free mode" first to enable rotate/scale). 
 
Oh, and did I mentioned that LL was light on memory, leaving more RAM for your apps ? 
 
With its wide set of options and switches, LL is one of the most customizable launcher, albeit perhaps not the easiest to configure yet ! Agreed, as most powerful tools, LL has a learning curve. But isn't that a small price to pay to get the most exciting and unique home screen ;-) 
 
All comments, suggestions and bug reports are welcome. Please email your questions and bug reports to me (Pierre Hébert) at pierrox@pierrox.net, or visit the facebook page at http://www.facebook.com/LightningLauncher to learn more on what I am currently working on, or request for some feature, or simply ask a question. 
\Enjoy ! 
\Permission: 
- EXPAND_STATUS_BAR: as its name says, used for the "Show status bar" action. 
- SET_WALLPAPER_HINTS: used to set the wallpaper dimension 
- no other permission needed !
No s\'ha pogut iniciar aquesta aplicació

Lightning Launcher és una pantalla d'inici alternativa d'Android personalitzable, ràpida i lleugera. 
 
LL ara prepararà la llista d'aplicacions una única vegada. 
 
No et perdis els tutorials de vídeo per aprendre més. 
 
Gaudeix !
fes un toc llarg \nper afegir elements \nmenu per més
Personalitza l\'aparença i comportament de l\'escriptori actual
Configuració per a la llista d\'aplicacions
Un tancador d\'aplicacions lleuger integrat directament en LL
Expressa la teua opinió a la botiga d\'aplicacions
Mira què hi ha en procès per a la propera versió, demana una nova característica, o reporta una errada
Crea o actualitza el teu propi paquet de llenguatge

Fes un toc llarg en un element

Entra automàticament en mode d\'edició quan s\'afegeix un nou element
Abreujarà \'tornar a l\'inici\', però evita-ho si vols estalviar memòria

Aquest estil té menys columnes que l\'actual. Continuar i reorganitzar elements ?

Orientació de pantalla, opcions de la barra d\'estat
No faces ús de quadrícula, permet ubicació lliure d\'elements (inclou escalat i rotació)
Permet que els elements tinguen dos posicions: una per mode vertical (primari) i altra per a l\'horitzontal

No hi ha copia de seguretat disponible
Error a la còpia de seguretat , comproveu que hi ha prou espai d'emmagatzematge en la sdcard
Error a la Restauració , comproveu que l'arxiu de còpia de seguretat és vàlida i es pot llegir
Realment voleu eliminar aquest escriptori ? \nAquest pas no es pot desfer.

Llista , text de grans dimensions i icones
Per obtenir ajuda sobre un escenari , feu una premuda llarga .
El més nou Launcher. Sense compromís
Organitza, esborra, afegeix i selecciona escriptoris per defecte

La vista "El meu calaix" li permet personalitzar completament el calaix de la seva aplicació . 
 
En aquesta mode, els elements es poden moure lliurement al voltant , i les carpetes es poden utilitzar per organitzar aplicacions. 
 
Intenta reduir el zoom i seleccionant "Edita layout " : aplicacions es poden posar en l'esquerra , dreta , pàgines superior i inferior també, el que li permet administrar les aplicacions en la seva pròpia manera.
carpeta buida \nArrossegar i deixar anar elements en la carpeta

S'ha detectat una instal·lació previa de Lightning Launcher \n \nA continuació , s'importen totes les dades. Quan es fa això pot desinstal·lar de forma segura la versió clàssica i utilitzar la nova en el seu lloc
Alguna cosa no ha funcionat durant la copia!
Tanqueu el calaix d'aplicació absn del llançament de l'aplicació
Aplicar un pack d'icones o tornar a les icones per defecte
Funciona amb paquets d'icones dissenyats per ADW i alguns altres
Aquest pack d'icones no és un app/taula d'icones
Reverteix la personalització de les icones
Això inclou l'escala interna i els efectes d'icones
L'objecte no s'ha instal·lat . El podeu cercar a Google Play , o escollir una altra aplicació?
Premuda llarga per a obtenir més informació
Intercanvia objectes si es superposen (nomès en mode reixeta)
Avís: si us plau llegiu l'ajuda primer ( pulsació llarga )
No es possible aplicar aquesta plantilla!
Cerca i aplica palntilles, exportar a APK
Pulsació llarga per a lelgir el tutorial
No es possible llegir aquesta plantilla
Aquesta plantilla s'ha disenyat per a una versió més nova de Lightning Launcher, voleu actualitzar-la?
La plantilla està a punt per ser aplicat , però s'han trobat alguns advertiments :
• aquesta plantilla s'ha dissenyat amb la versió completa del Rayo Launcher , pot utilitzar algunes de les característiques que no estan disponibles en aquesta versió .
• aquesta plantilla no coincideix exactament amb les característiques de la pantalla. Alguns elements poden ser escalats i es poden mostren de forma incorrecta , o es poden veuen borrosos .
• el dispositiu no és capaç de restaurar els ginys de forma automàtica, haurà de tornar a crear-los manualment .
Ho sento, no es pot trobar el giny :( . premmeu per a tornar a provar
Honor pinned items in edit mode
Stop points are always displayed, even in normal mode
Allow only a single opened folder at a time
Use the desktop size to compute the cell size, not the panel size
Select the desktop to be shown on the lock screen. Long tap for a tutorial.
Select or disable the lock screen
Select a desktop, tap and cancel to disable it
The lock screen has been disabled.
The Unlocker Plugin is not installed yet. Tap to install
Before to lock, please ensure that this desktop can be unlocked safely, either using an unlocker or an \"Unlock screen\" action.
Stop points conflict with the \'Snap to page\' option: it has been automatically turned off.
Rotate the item upon screen rotation
Unknown or deleted script, a new one has been created.
This script may be in use in other actions. Are you sure to delete it ?
Replace: fully replace the current setup
Merge: keep the current setup, import the template as new desktops
Update: keep desktops and items, apply style from desktops in the template only
You are about to apply the template \'%s\':
Apps launched from the lock screen will unlock at the same time
The desktop can be scrolled beyond its limit
Identify this item with a name
Unleash the power of LL by displaying advanced options
Warning: script execution is currently disabled in general settings

Your apps are here. 
You can launch apps from there and start adding apps to the desktop: long press on some app and select "Add to launcher". 
 
Tap to learn more.

You just added a folder. Folders can contain apps, widgets or even other folders. 
 
Drag some item over it, wait a bit for the move to be confirmed (at the end of the animation), then drop the object: it will be moved inside the folder. 
 
Tap to learn more on folders.

Your first panel is here. 
A panel behaves a bit like a folder: drag item over it, wait a bit for the move to be confirmed (end of the animation), then drop the object. 
 
Tap to learn more on panels.

This is your desktop. Long tap to add objects (apps, widgets, folders, more) and access settings. 
 
Pages are created as soon as you drag objects over them: to the left and right sides, but also to the top and bottom sides. 
 
Tap to learn more on LL concepts.
Display the action bar on scroll
When reaching a side, items from the other side are displayed as if the desktop were a sphere
Use alpha to adjust the saturation
Set status and navigation bars visibility, transparency, etc.
Constraint the ripples inside the item\'s boundaries

A side bar is a customized folder. Drop items here to move them into the side bar. Tap on the icon to toggle the side bar, or assign it to a gesture or any other event. Change the window alignment values to dock it on other sides.
A page indicator displays the current page position in the desktop. By default this is item pinned and not clickable. Enter the edit layout mode first to change its style, color, etc.
A stop point is a tool to create custom scrolling scheme: the desktop will stop scrolling at stop points. Long tap on a stop point to edit its properties. Stop points are only visible in edit mode.

A bookmark saves the current position and scale of your desktop. Once the bookmark has been created you can move it anywhere else, tapping on it will automatically bring you back to the memorized desktop position. It works inside panels and folders too!
Swipe from the left edge to reveal the drawer

The seamless mode is automatically disabled in edit mode, otherwise empty pages wouldn\'t be reachable. Be aware that some items may then suddenly disappear when entering edit mode: they are just displayed at their original position in the desktop instead of being "wrapped". \nSeamless mode is enabled again when exiting edit mode.

Hint: in order to create a new page, simply add or drag some item on it. 
This works for pages above and below too, try it! 
 
(you can safely delete this hint)
Hint: use one or two fingers swipe up to reveal the user menu (you can customize it), long tap somewhere to display a contextual menu. \n \n(you can safely delete this hint)
The Script Importer is not installed
Would you like to install it from the Play Store?
At least one category need to be selected…
Please unlock Lightning to use this feature

Upgrade to the Full Lightning version to benefit from more features: 
 
- Advanced app drawer (folders, action bar, categories). 
- Add, remove, rearrange desktops at will. 
- Per desktop wallpaper. 
- Unread count, badges and dynamic text. 
- Customizable lock screen. 
- Integrated app killer. 
 
If you already unlocked Lightning in the past, please select "OK" to re-activate this version.
This feature is not available in the trial version
Upgrade to get the most out of Lightning

Thank you for testing Lightning! 
 
The app will run in trial mode for 7 days: all features are enabled and can be used without restriction during this period. After the trial period, the app will still be usable but editing will not be enabled anymore. 
 
If you like this app and wish to support it, please consider purchasing the key to unlock it. 
 
Thank you!

You are a long time user of the free version of Lighting Launcher, thank you. 
 
Although this version has been replaced with a trial version, you will still benefit from all previously existing features for free, as well as most improvements made in the full app since the last update. 
 
If you wish to support this app, please consider purchasing the unlock key at a discounted loyalty price. 
 
Thanks!

Lightning need your feedback! 
 
Would you like to take a few seconds to rate this app on the Play Store?
This is a sample lock screen that you can customize at will. \nAdd apps or widgets then activate it through the lock screen settings (tap here).
Please read the documentation before to change this value
Custom views are designed for advanced use cases. It enables Android view creation through scripting and as a consequence it requires advanced scripting and Android knowledge.
One or more widget will be deleted. Widget deletion cannot be fully undone and you may have to recreate the widget content. Do you wish to continue?
Style copied, now use \'Paste the style\' to replicate it.
I think I already told you there were no script ;-)
Please do not insist, there is no script here.
Well, that\'s enough, please stop. Otherwise I\'ll have to create a script.
OK, if this is the only way to be in peace, let\'s go, I will now create a script…
No custom view. \nTap to try again.
Switching to \'My Drawer\' view for customization
